flavor_text_entries.text:
３０００年ほど　昔の
文明で　つくられた　石像。

A stone figurine made by an ancient
civilization about 3,000 years ago.

Statua scolpita circa 3000 anni fa
da un’antica civiltà.

Aumenta mucho la Defensa en combate.
Al cambiar de Pokémon, el efecto desaparece.

Eine Statue, angefertigt von einer
gut 3 000 Jahre alten Kultur.

Une statuette d’une civilisation vieille de plus de
3 000 ans.

3000년 정도 된
오랜 문명에서 만들어진 석상.

３０００ねんほど　むかしの
ぶんめいで　つくられた　せきぞう。

A stone figure made in a civilization
about 3,000 years ago.
A maniac will buy it for a high price.

A stone figure made in a civilization
about 3,000 years ago.
A maniac will buy it for a high price.

Une statuette d’une civilisation
vieille de plus de 3 000 ans.
Les amateurs en donnent un bon prix.
